## Dual unitarity: motivation

- Minimal model of __local__ and __unitary__ many-body dynamics with many interesting properties

  - __Exact solvability__

  - __Maximally chaotic__

  - __Maximal entanglement velocity__: spreads at fastest possible rate

---

## Dual unitarity round-a-face^[[Prosen, Chaos 31, 093101 (2021)](https://pubs.aip.org/aip/cha/article-abstract/31/9/093101/974675/Many-body-quantum-chaos-and-dual-unitarity-round-a?redirectedFrom=fulltext)]

- Circuits with similar properties built from 1-site 2-controlled gates

![](assets/du-round-a-face.png)

- Dual-unitarity: enforce unitarity when exchanging indices: $\tilde U_{a,c}$ unitary where  

$$
(\tilde U_{a,c})_{b,d} \equiv (U_{b,d})_{a,c}
$$

- _Common framework for round-a-face (__clockwork__) and brickwork circuits?_

## Heterogenous biunitary cicuits

- We can vary the shading pattern...

![](assets/heterogenous-circuits-1.png)

- ...by introducing new elements

![](assets/heterogenous-circuits-2.png){width=40% fig-align="center"}

- Biunitarity implies that these vertices correspond to __quantum Latin squares__

- Matrix of vectors $U_{a,b}$ with _every row and column_ forming orthonormal basis

---

## Quantum latin squares^[[D. J. Reutter and J. Vicary, Higher Structures 3, 109 (2019)](https://articles.math.cas.cz/10.21136/HS.2019.04)]

- __Vertical unitarity__ determines the properties of the rows

![](assets/quantum-latin-squares.png){width=80% fig-align="center"}

- __Horitzontal unitarity__ fixes same property for the columns

# Conclusions

- Dual-unitary models are a class of exactly solvable models for many-body dynamics

- We embed them in a general class of __biunitary circuits__

- Biunitaries compose into biunitaries (Dual-unitary gates, quantum crosses, unitary error bases, complex Hadamard matrices, quantum Latin squares)

- Any graphical proof for dual-unitarity directly extends to biunitarity
